title: Brightness Fullscreen Mac
body:
Why can't I change the brightness (on my keyboard) on my mac when in fullscreen?  I can change the volume using the volume buttons on the keyboard.  I used to play in bordered and it was really good but now its different and so I have to use fullscreen.

Thanks

replies.body: It most likely has something to do with League's keybindings overtaking the Mac Desktop keybindings. You may just need to adjust the brightness outside of League.
